alert.note: Alert for Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cherry County through 415 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Whitman, or 35 miles northwest of Mullen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Speckel Meir Lake, Sevenmile Hill, Round Lake, Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road and Hire. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 170 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
